alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Crook (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 2:03PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Butte and northeastern Crook Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Colony, or 30 miles northwest of Belle Fourche, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antelope Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
